summary: The number of veterans receiving mental health care from the Department of Veterans Affairs increased 90% from FY 2006-2019. During this time, VA's mental health budget increased from $2.4 to $8.9 billion. VA projects a 32% increase in outpatient mental health care over 10 years Preventing suicide is VA's highest priority; veterans are 1.5 times more likely to die by suicide VA conducts outreach to...
title: Veterans' Growing Demand for Mental Health Services
